full_summary:
# CORCAN - Computer Skills Training Program
## Tender Details

### Technical Specifications
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a distributor of testing certifications for the courses listed below:

- IC3 – Intermediate Computer Certification program
- MOS – Microsoft Specialist Program for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
- Autodesk Certifications – a commercial computer-aided design and drafting software application
- Adobe Certifications
- Intuit – a business/financial software designed for use by individuals and small businesses

The goal is to provide offenders with sufficient internet and certification skills to enter current job markets or begin higher education programs.

### Contractor Expectations

- Provide course materials designed for learning computer and internet basics based on Windows, Microsoft Office, and Internet Explorer platforms
- Offer software training and maintenance support
- Install licenses on standalone and local wide area networks in 10 operation sites in Ontario, Prairies, and Quebec region
- Provide access to software to support the training of offenders on the following:
  - PDF license of book-based curriculum
  - Benchmark and assessment of GMetrix
  - Certification exams for all certification programs and levels
- Prepare offenders for their certification program in MOS, IC3, and AutodeskCAD

### Evaluation Criteria
To be eligible, suppliers must demonstrate:

- At least 5 years of experience in providing training for software certifications for Microsoft Specialist Program for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (MOS), Intermediate Computer Certification program (IC3), and AutoDesk CAD courses
- At least 1 year of experience in providing training and certifications for Microsoft Specialist Program for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (MOS), Intermediate Computer Certification Program (IC3), and AutoDesk CAD to offenders using various formats, including Internet, Learning Management System, Local or wide area networks, and Standalone computers
- At least 5 years of experience in providing licenses, training materials, and certifications in a digital format for all requested software applications and programs
- At least 2 years of experience in providing benchmark pre-test and post-test tools to support the training of offenders for all software applications and program delivery formats

### Procurement Details

- The tender closing date is Friday, February 3rd, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
- Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities in writing to Danielle Cameron at danielle.cameron@csc-scc.gc.ca
- The proposed contract is for a period of 1 year, with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods
- The
